name: transfers_list_records
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool transfermarket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for transfer news, latest or record transfers, rumors, player market value, etc... to create a sporting site/application such as transfermarkt.com
API description: Fetches transfer records and player information for a given competition, position group, or club.

competitionid.description: The value of id field returned in .../search or .../competitions/list... endpoints. DO NOT use together with clubID

positiongroup.description: Filter for position group such as 'Abwehr', 'Mittelfeld', or 'Sturm'. Defaults to None.

clubid.description: The value of id field returned in .../search or .../clubs/list-by-competition endpoints. DO NOT use together with competitionID

offset.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return per response. Defaults to 30.

positionid.description: One of the following 1-Goalkeeper|2-Sweeper|3-Centre-Back|4-Left-Back|5-Right-Back|6-Defensive Midfield|7-Central Midfield|8-Right Midfield|9-Left Midfield|10-Attacking Midfield|11-Left Winger|12-Right Winger|13-Second Striker|14-Centre-Forward

domain.description: The domain of the API, such as 'com', 'de', 'be', 'es', 'it', 'nl', 'pl', 'pt', 'com.tr', or 'world'. Defaults to 'de'.
